body: Methinks someone is overthinking a porno comic.

Micchan in the first chapter said to her friend She was always spacing out and didn’t know how the world works… and in the first pages of this one he made fun of her again practically calling her stupid... But who is the real Baka? I think she is the biggest one, she was dancing the tune of Kanae knowing fully well how dumb/oblivious her friend is... Oh well enjoy a lifetime of slavery by the cock! XD
